Education is everything: the real key to success, satisfaction, and financial freedom. The difficulty nowadays is the exceedingly high cost associated with studying at an institution of higher learning, which often is followed by the heavy load of decades of regular monthly loan payments. Right this moment, private colleges cost,on average, twenty seven thousand dollars per year in tuition and fees alone. Graduate/Post-Grad studies are even more steeply-priced, averaging $38,655 annually. So, to attend college and a four-year graduate school will cost you more than two hundred fifty thousand dollars in tuition by itself. When you add things like an apartment or dorm, everyday expenditures, and books the overall rate can expand to roughly five hundred thousand dollars.
;
;Those that are willing to sign up for a loan often cannot get one. This is in truth fortunate for them, since the payments on a loan of that size would run them more or less $5,000 per month. During the life of the loan (a decade more or less) a grad would pay out over three hundred grand in interest alone. There is now, however, another solution: a new course titled University For Free.
;
;University For Free describes how a person can:
; Go to college 100% for free (free tuition or free tuition and expenses)
; Attend graduate school 100% for free (free tuition or free tuition and expenses)
; Attend college one hundred percent free (acquire no loans, and earn your diploma with zero debt)
;Go to graduate school 100% free (acquire no loans, and earn your degree with absolutely no debt)
;
